description: “All staff” refers to every employee at InnoSoft Solutions, including developers, designers, project managers, engineers and administrative staff who receive company-wide emails.
relationship: The staff members are John’s coworkers and, in many cases, his direct reports. Notable individuals within the group are Sarah (front-end developer needing ergonomic changes) and Jane (engineer requesting hearing-related accommodations). They look to John for updates on office renovations, workflow changes and project status.
